attributes.action: Abolish the TV licence. Make BBC advertise for their revenue.
attributes.additional_details: Also, it’s disgusting that over 75’s are being forced to pay now. Especially when you see the bumper salaries that their “stars” are being paid.
attributes.background: It’s about time the TV licence was abolished. In 2019 with so many options for premium TV, online streaming etc, why should people be forced to pay for a channel when there are so many options available to them. The BBC should specifically charge for their channels if wanted, not tax a whole nation
